sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead } from 'mdbreact'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; const StockTable = (props) => { const {stock} = props; const moneyFormat = new Intl.NumberFormat(); const dlyChange = document.getElementById('dlyChange'); if (stock.Symbol) { return Analytic Value Company {stock.LongName} Ticker {stock.Symbol} Price {stock.Price} Previous Close {stock.PreviousClose} ( {stock.ChangePercent.toFixed(2)} {stock.ChangePercent ? '%' : ''} ) Market Cap. ${moneyFormat.format(stock.MarketCap)} Currency {stock.Currency} P.E. Ratio {stock.PriceEarningsRatio.toFixed(2)}{stock.PriceEarningsRatio >= 0 ? 'x' : ''} Sector / Industry {stock.Sector}/{stock.Industry} } return null; } export default StockTable;
